title: Highschool Mean Girls 3
description: High School Mean Girls 3 is a fun beauty dress-up game that combines high school drama with glamorous fashion! Step into the world of competitive style as you transform two rival friend groups into showstopping fashion icons. Choose outfits, accessories, and hairstyles that will make each group stand out as they compete to claim the title of the best-dressed squad. With endless styling possibilities, itâ€™s up to you to decide which group will reign supreme in the world of high school fashion.
